metadata.title: Carex Commode Liners, 7 count
features: 7 total portable toilet liners. Each commode liner an hold up to 2 quarts of liquid. Our portable toilet bags are universal fit and will work with most commodes, uplift commodes, camping potty or potty chairs for handicapped adults
Disposable, hygienic, and Leak Proof. Commode liners come with 7 disposable commode liners per package. Perfect for a bedside Commode, travel commode, or camping potty.

Thick commode bags. No accidents, no leaks, no yuck with these portable toilet bags. Our potty chair liners are durable, won't rip, and are very strong. Disposable liners come with absorbent powder, reducing smell and liquid.
Super absorbent powder on the commode bag dries up liquid and reduces smells. Commode liners will also work for bedpan liners or as a replacement for porta potty bags and camping toilet bags.

Commode bucket replacement. To replace the commode liner, simply close up the bag, tie up the handles, and place in the garbage. Replace immediately with a new commode liner. Compatible with the Medline commode and drive commodes
description: Eliminate messy commode bucket cleaning with Carex Commode Liners. These super absorbent liners provide caregivers with a convenient solution to easier commode cleaning and sanitation. These blue commode liners have an absorbent powder in the bottom to reduce odor. Each bag can be used up to 3 times; holds up to two (2) quarts of liquid. When done, simply tie the handles and dispose of in the trash. Comes in a dispenser box package for easy storage. Perfect for bedside or travel use.
